column1: and  credible  a  trial  court  can  act  on  that  evidence  alone.  However,  in  the
instant  action,  I  am  of  the  view  the  evidence  of  the  mother  as  well  as  the
grandmother  and  the  medical  officer  who  examined  the  child  are  consistent
with the evidence of the victim.
The Indian Supreme Court in Bhoginbhai Hirijibai Vs. The State of Gujarat
